alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 11:51PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, southeastern Liberty, southwestern Jefferson and eastern Franklin Counties through 100 AM EST... At 1151 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles west of Crawfordville to 8 miles south of St George Island. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, St George Island, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Carrabelle Beach, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Shadeville, Hells Half Acre, Royal Bluff, Wakulla Springs, St George Island St Pk, Panacea, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek and Medart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
